subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: “I never came here to make the playoffs,” said Mike Babcock, who spent 10 seasons with Detroit before Toronto hired him in May. “I came here to be involved in a Cup process.”
snippet: “I never came here to make the playoffs,” said Mike Babcock, who spent 10 seasons with Detroit before Toronto hired him in May. “I came here to be involved in a Cup process.”
